text: Ivan Nicholas Johnson (27 June 1953 - 4 October 2021) was a Bahamian-born English first-class cricketer and journalist. He played for Worcestershire County Cricket Club from 1972 to 1975. He was a journalist for newspapers in Fleet Street. In 1990, Johnson founded The Punch."Ivan Johnson" ESPN cricket information website. Accessed June 2016. Johnson died of a heart attack on 4 October 2021 in Nassau at the age of 68.Editor of the MIGHTY PUNCH dies following a massive heart attack tonight at 68. ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:1953 births Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Bahamian people Category:English and Welsh cricketers Category:English journalists
title: Ivan Johnson
